Period: The quarter and year for which the compliance training metrics are reported.
Employee Group: The specific group of employees for which the compliance training metrics are reported (e.g., all employees, new hires, department-specific).
Compliance Training Completion Rate: The percentage of employees in the specified group who completed compliance training during the reported period.
Target Completion Rate: The target percentage of employees expected to complete compliance training during the reported period.
Status: Indicates whether the actual completion rate met, exceeded, or fell short of the target completion rate.
